metadata.title: CVE-2020-24870 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Libraw before 0.20.1 has a stack buffer overflow viaLibRaw::identify_process_dng_fields in identify.cpp.

criterions.comment: libraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
